titles.title: Robocaller Identification Act
To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the use of autodialers for purposes of political solicitations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/11/2005--Introduced. Robocaller Identification Act - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the use of autodialers for political purposes unless the identities and certain other information of the persons or entities responsible for initiating and funding the call are provided. Defines "political purpose."
